attributes.action: STOP firework sales to the public
attributes.additional_details:
It is a national problem, and tonight of all nights costs the public thousands, if you take away the easy access you take away the problem. 
Shops should not be able to sell fireworks to anyone. It’s like giving that person a gun… 
The damage is life changing. 

We should all be allowed to watch and love fireworks safely.. 

The new firework fights is so fundamentally dangerous to all of society. Those in the fire line, who try to stop this are the police, our public sectors. They are not safe. Let alone our children being shot at or our houses that can be hit, also those who are firing them, they are in a car with petrol, oil. We have to make everyone safe
attributes.background: I want you to make our streets safe, every year the police have to deal with anti-social behaviour and violence. These Fireworks are so dangerous. They should only be sold to those who have a health and safety permit, liscenced to let off fireworks in a display

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Limit the sale and use of Fireworks to licence holders only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
